title: Strengthening Programming Competency: BIM and IFC-Based Architectural Digital Transformation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of architectural design and construction, with experience using CAD software
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of BIM processes and IFC standards with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can perform basic modeling tasks using BIM software (Revit, ArchiCAD, etc.) in mobile environments
Learners can apply data interoperability solutions using IFC file formats to real-world cases
Learners design collaboration-based BIM project workflows and achieve 70% or higher success rates in team simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
